5 hours ago · Bristol, United Kingdom Read Full Article gbnews.com Lean Right Mixed Factuality National Lottery winner returns to work Tesco delivery shift after huge prize A Tesco delivery driver who won a multi-million pound fortune just days before Christmas has announced he intends to return to work.Jonny Johnston from Co Fermanagh in Northern Ireland won a £3.8million Lotto jackpot on December 23.Despite receiving an email from National Lottery informing him of his win, it was not until the next day that the 45-year-old realised the extent of his fortune.After spotting a message from the lottery in his inbox, …
